replies.body: When is URF (ultra rapid fire) out?
A few weeks ago they said there will not be urf this year since they are adding a new gamemode thing and that will have urf,all for one and a few other gamemodes rotate each week
got a link to that? im sitting here waiting for my urf

Check out the [RGM queue announcement](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue). With current plans, there should be more URF per year than previous years. This could change if more modes are added to the queue.
C'mon just give me URF back
